data.description:
Beat Saber is a unique VR rhythm game where your goal is to slash the beats (represented by small cubes) as they are coming at you. 

Every beat indicates which saber you need to use and also the direction you need to match. All the music is composed to perfectly fit the handmade levels. 

Our goal is to make players almost dance while cutting the cubes and avoiding obstacles.

Each cut is strongly supported by great sound and visual effects to emphasize the rhythm.

changelog.change_log: Get hyped about the new OST 7 release, featuring 5 tracks from community-favorites Teminite x Boom Kitty, Lindsey Stirling, Camellia,  F.O.O.L, and Nitro Fun. OST 7 is free and available now!

Quality of life improvements and various bug fixes.
Quality of life improvements and various bug fixes.
* Fixed: [Quest2][Quest3] Filter list fix for Parent Managed accounts.
NEW DROP: The Hip Hop Mixtape is now available Beat Saber, featuring artists that defined the genre, like Tupac, Snoop Dogg, Nicki Minaj and Eminem. All tracks are uncensored.

Daft Punk Music Pack is now available on Beat Saber! Immerse yourself in 10 pulsing hits from the legendary electronic duo and a breathtaking new environment inspired by their live shows.

Hey players, we've released an update 1.34.5, adding several tweaks and fixes. Please note that this update doesn't include any new music or feature content.

A new free song from community favorite Boom Kitty just landed as part of the Original Soundtrack 6. Grab your sabers and play now!
OST 6 just landed on Beat Saber! Slash to the beats of community favorites like DragonForce, Camellia, and Lindsey Stirling in the new, free Original Soundtrack 6. All tracks are Content ID free.

Experience the rock legends – The Rolling Stones – in Beat Saber. The new 11-song music pack features some of their biggest hits together with the tracks from the new album “Hackney Diamonds”.
